info.name: GGRadio.net Dark Mode
info.description:
This will turn the forum of GGRadio to a darker version to save your poor eyes. Have fun, contact me on Discord if I missed something or want me to make another website dark.

Discord: Hamtaro#2312
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog v1.1.0 -
